mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Eight More Miles to Louisville", "Back Away", and "Hill Topper". ROUND DANCES "Copenhagen", and "Let's Do It". SPECIAL FEATURES "Dance Camps To Your Choice", "What's Being Danced - in Rounds", "Spotlighting a Canadian", "Club Constitution", "Party in Hawaiiian Theme", "Latest From Louisville", "Want to Plan a Trail Dance?", and "Iraquii Enjoy American Square Dancing in Old Bagdad". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "From the Floor", "As I See It", "Style Series: Who's On First", "Ladies on the Square: "Do-It-Yourself" Square Dance Fashions. Part II", "Chuck Jones note Book", "Paging the Roundancers: Dick & Evelyn Doyle", "Square of the Month: John Wald", "Round the Outside Ring", and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
